summary: EXTREAMLY RUSTED FASTENERS ATTACHING THE FOLDING STEPS TO THE BODY.  THE MOTORHOME WAS STATIONARY WHEN DISCOVERY WAS MADE.  IF THE STEPS HAD SEPARATED WHILE IN MOTION THEY WOULD HAVE BEEN RUN OVER BY THE RIGHT FRONT WHEEL AND THE REAR DUAL WHEELS.  I AM ENCLOSING A PICTURE OF THE FASTENERS THAT WERE REMOVED AND THE STEPS AFTER REPAIR.
